topic.title: reddit
topic.body:
why does reddit ban users that use tor ?

here a [example](https://www.reddit.com/user/zerodude12032016)

1_16m4KFYTxwbNsMUau3t493txwvHxnwb3b9.body:
> [musickiller](#comment_69_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ): how exactly do you suppose ppl will update it? r u gonna give your private key? =D

you can clone the website

1_1KPRZRpbJtMeTWDQ2zFWoTTzuGRft39HfC.body: @nofish zeronet homepage link to reddit and you send users there but they ban everyone using tor

> [nofish](#comment_489_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): I have used Tor, but never got banned. (i was only able to add one comment per 30 minute or similar)

when ? did you try again ?

> [nofish](#comment_489_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): I have used Tor, but never got banned. (i was only able to add one comment per 30 minute or similar)

i made a new test
